title: PEGA: Personality-Guided Preference Aggregator for Ephemeral Group Recommendation. (arXiv:2304.08851v1 [cs.IR])
abstract: Recently, making recommendations for ephemeral groups which contain dynamic users and few historic interactions have received an increasing number of attention. The main challenge of ephemeral group recommender is how to aggregate individual preferences to represent the group's overall preference.
